Package Histograms_Statistics

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Compute_Histogram  
    Create_New_Image
    This plugin demonstrates how to create and display a new byte image.
    Integral_Image_GetRoiStatistics
    This ImageJ plugin calculates the integral image for the current image (8 bit grayscale only) and displays the resulting first and second order summed area tables.
    Integral_Image_Test
    This ImageJ plugin calculates the integral image for the current image (8 bit grayscale only) and displays the resulting first and second order summed area tables.
    Test_GetStatistics
    This plugin tests the ImageStatistics class.
